select from t_recommend where recruitment_id = #{recruitmentId} and data_state = 1

SELECT
FROM t_recommend tr left join t_user tu on tr.user_id = tu.id left join t_recruitment tre on tr.recruitment_id = tre.id left join t_company tc on tc.id = tre.company_id
data_state = 1
AND ( tu.name like concat('%',#{obj.keyWords},'%') or tr.name like concat('%',#{obj.keyWords},'%') or tre.title like concat('%',#{obj.keyWords},'%') or tc.name like concat('%',#{obj.keyWords},'%') )
and mobile = #{obj.mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
and type = #{obj.type,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
order by name
mapper.update: update t_recommend set recruitment_id = #{obj.recruitmentId}, name = #{obj.name}, mobile = #{obj.mobile}, state = #{obj.state}, data_state = #{obj.dataState}, update_time = now() where id = #{id}
